Teon Mehta â€“ Based in Montreal, Canada

I'm a self taught developer | creative.

While playing basketball in college, I possessed this idea for an app to help athletes like myself get to where they want to be. I took some time off school to travel overseas and play basketball professionally. But in the back of my mind, I had a thirst to bring my ideas to life. So I did my research. Taught myself to code & I've been hooked on technology ever since. I strive for knowledge taking in as much information as i can to fuel my creativity. I use that information to put my plans in motion, developing & growing.
